name: Shipyard
description: A facility for building and repairing ships provides essential maritime infrastructure and employment. The valuable ships and materials attract both legitimate business and thieves, while the skilled labor creates opportunities for apprenticeship and trade.
atmosphere: Massive wooden frameworks support ships under construction while craftsmen work with hammer, saw, and adze. The air fills with fresh timber, hot tar, and skilled craftsmanship. Dry docks and launching ways enable ship construction and repair. Essential maritime infrastructure for any seafaring community.
